item.title: Adventures with a Pygmy
item.author: karl.hepworth@gmail.com (Karl Hepworth)
item.description: Pygmy is the tool which helps the amazeeio-network Docker network resolve a few issues for local development, and I was never really happy with it… I suppose even though all of those problems are no longer an issue, but the history is now there. What I perceived to be a broken proxy was simply not suited to what I was doing - even though I wasn’t doing anything unsuitable. Cloning a repository in two directories and running them with docker-compose seems like a tough ask for some…
